team11.core.schema

Class RestartLevelSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • team11.core.schema.RestartLevelSchema
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Schema

    public class RestartLevelSchema
extends java.lang.Object
implements Schema
    Provides a general schema to be used to restart the current active level in the Angry Birds game.
    Author:
    Chris N. Hartley (cnhartle@calpoly.edu)

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean restartLevel()
      Restarts the current level and returns true if the game state after restarting the level is set to playing.

    • Constructor Detail

      • RestartLevelSchema

        public RestartLevelSchema()

    • Method Detail

      • restartLevel

        public boolean restartLevel()
        Restarts the current level and returns true if the game state after restarting the level is set to playing. Otherwise, this returns false because the game state is not set to playing.
        Returns:
        true after the level is restarted and the game state is set to playing; otherwise, returns false.
